item.title: Re: Missing Artificer Infusion changes from Tasha's.
item.content:encoded:
About the new Mind Sharpener infusion:
On the wiki, it says "(requires attunement)". On my physical copy, it doesn't.
That's not the only place on the internet where it says that it requires attunement (and honestly it should), but I didn't found the source of this errata / clarification.

Another point, where I'm sure that's a mistake: replicating Cloak of Elvenkind requires attunement.

item.title: Re: Missing Artificer Infusion changes from Tasha's.
item.content:encoded: Sorry for the delay, made these updates. I looked at the Errata released for Eberron that coincided with the release of Tasha's and that seems to be all the changes made. Can't guarantee I didn't miss one, but I think that's all. Let me know if you find anything else.

item.title: Missing Artificer Infusion changes from Tasha's.
item.content:encoded:
It looks like a lot of the Artificer changes from Tasha's have been added already, but I came across a few more things that haven't been updated yet on the Ariticer Infusions page:

  • Homunculus Servant: item needed now reads as a gem or crystal worth at least 100 GP, no longer lists dragonshard
  • Homunculus Servant: no longer has a level requirement, page currently still lists previous Level 6 req
  • Homunculus Servant stat block: Perception should be +0 plus (PB x 2), page lists as +0 plus PB
  • Replicate Magic Item: the third paragraph of the description has been removed
  • Replicate Magic Item: Armblade, Prosthetic Limb, and Wand Sheath have been removed
  • Replicate Magic Item: added to 10th level list is Necklace of Adaptation, which requires attunement

That's all that I've noticed so far, but might be worth having someone go through the list again as well in case if I missed something!
